description:
The Cloudvista is the shoe for any trail runner. Made to flow over forest flats and cruise through lakeside loops, it's Swiss-engineered for soft rides on hard-packed trails. Versatile, agile and comfortable, it's all about enjoying the experience and the thrill of being in nature.

One of the lightest shoes in their trail collection, the Cloudvista's upper gives you comfort-focused agility that's easy to wear. With more than 70% recycled polyester, a perforated tongue and a TPU mudguard, it's tech made for trails with style that works beyond them.

Change the way you see trail running. Ultra-lightweight and versatile, the Cloudvista combines Helion™ superfoam with CloudTec® for unbeatable comfort. While the always reliable Missiongrip™ means it's the perfect shoe for any trail runner across short to middle distances.
name: ON Running Cloudvista - Mens
